meanings.sent1: She noticed a spet of paint on her shirt.
meanings.sent2: The spet of mud on his shoes showed he had been playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The tiny spet of ketchup on his cheek made him look like a clown.
meanings.sent4: The spet of light on the wall created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The spet of glitter on her dress made her shine like a star.

meanings.definition: To eject saliva forcibly from one's mouth
meanings.sent1: He accidentally spet while talking excitedly.
meanings.sent2: The baby spet out the medicine the moment it touched his tongue.
meanings.sent3: She spet out her drink in surprise when she heard the news.
meanings.sent4: The fountain spet water high into the air.
meanings.sent5: The angry cat spet furiously at the dog invading its territory.

meanings.definition: To strike or dash with force
meanings.sent1: The waves spet against the rocks with great power.
meanings.sent2: He spet the ball with all his might, sending it flying across the field.
meanings.sent3: The superhero spet the villain with lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: The storm spet through the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The hammer spet the nail into the wood effortlessly.
